stories.Title: Say hello to your new assistant!
stories.Description: Microsoft is integrating Copilot into Windows 11, allowing the AI-powered assistant to help you navigate, customize settings, and connect with your favorite apps directly from the taskbar.
stories.Tweet: Say hello to your new assistant! 📦 Microsoft is integrating Copilot into Windows 11, allowing the AI-powered assistant to help you navigate, customize settings, and connect with your favorite apps directly from the taskbar. #microsoft https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/23/23732454/microsoft-ai-windows-11-copilot-build

stories.Title: Google makes merchant lives easier
stories.Description: Announced at Google Marketing Live, Product Studio revolutionizes product imagery for brands. With the help of generative AI, it creates stunning visuals, avoiding the need for costly photoshoots.
stories.Tweet: Google makes merchant lives easier 📦 Announced at Google Marketing Live, Product Studio revolutionizes product imagery for brands. With the help of generative AI, it creates stunning visuals, avoiding the need for costly photoshoots. #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/23/google-product-studio-tool-lets-merchants-create-product-imagery-using-generative-ai/

stories.Title: AI takes the mic in Spotify podcasts
stories.Description: According to reports, the platform is exploring the use of AI-generated voices to read podcast ads, offering a unique and immersive experience for listeners.
stories.Tweet: AI takes the mic in Spotify podcasts 📦 According to reports, the platform is exploring the use of AI-generated voices to read podcast ads, offering a unique and immersive experience for listeners. #spotify https://gizmodo.com/spotify-ai-bill-simmons-podcasts-1850466648

stories.Title: Meta’s year of efficiency continues…
stories.Description: As part of its cost-saving strategy and aim to improve "efficiency," the company has announced another round of layoffs, this time targeting business groups.
stories.Tweet: Meta’s year of efficiency continues…  📦 As part of its cost-saving strategy and aim to improve "efficiency," the company has announced another round of layoffs, this time targeting business groups. #meta https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/24/meta-layoffs-latest-round-of-cuts-focuses-on-business-groups.html

stories.Title: We're getting closer to Apple's Reality Pro
stories.Description: Apple keeps adding fuel to the speculations surrounding its mixed reality headset by inviting several virtual reality experts to this year's WWDC... Are we finally getting an announcement?

stories.Title: Gitai's vision for lunar exploration
stories.Description: The Japanese startup, with its mission of using autonomous robots for lunar activities, has successfully secured $30 million in funding.
stories.Tweet: Gitai's vision for lunar exploration 📦 The Japanese startup, with its mission of using autonomous robots for lunar activities, has successfully secured $30 million in funding. #space https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/24/gitai-wants-to-build-the-robotic-labor-force-for-the-moon-and-mars/

stories.Title: Imagine building a home in outer space
stories.Description: NASA’s MMPACT team is on a mission to turn lunar regolith into a dynamic paste, paving the way for limitless potential in 3D-printed habitats on the Moon and Mars.
stories.Tweet: Imagine building a home in outer space 📦 NASA’s MMPACT team is on a mission to turn lunar regolith into a dynamic paste, paving the way for limitless potential in 3D-printed habitats on the Moon and Mars. #NASA https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/05/how-nasa-plans-to-melt-the-moon-and-build-on-mars/

stories.Title: Figure is a leading force in robotics
stories.Description: In a significant funding milestone, the company raised $70 million to propel the development and manufacturing of its general-purpose humanoid robots.
stories.Tweet: Figure is a leading force in robotics 📦 In a significant funding milestone, the company raised $70 million to propel the development and manufacturing of its general-purpose humanoid robots. #robotics https://www.reuters.com/technology/ai-startup-figure-raises-70-million-build-humanoid-robots-2023-05-24/

stories.Title: Brace yourself for the next Gigafactory
stories.Description: Tesla's expansion plans take center stage as CEO Elon Musk hints at a new factory location announcement by year-end. Will it be Canada, India, France, or somewhere unexpected?

stories.Title: Volvo’s sustainable approach
stories.Description: The upcoming EX30 small SUV from Volvo, with its compact and eco-friendly design, aims to cater to a younger demographic while offering the lowest-ever carbon footprint.
